title: Heat the Pan
instruction: Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat, then add vegetable oil.

title: Cook the Aromatics
instruction: Saut√© minced garlic and sliced onion for 1-2 minutes until fragrant and the onions start to soften.

title: Add the Vegetables
instruction: Add sliced bell pepper, julienned carrot, sliced zucchini, broccoli florets, and snap peas to the pan. Stir-fry for about 5-7 minutes until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.

title: Season the Vegetables
instruction: Pour in soy sauce and optional oyster sauce, stir well to coat all the vegetables evenly. Drizzle with sesame oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: Optional Thickening
instruction: If you prefer a thicker sauce, mix cornstarch with water to create a slurry. Pour the slurry into the pan and stir well until the sauce thickens slightly.

title: Serve
instruction: Once the vegetables are cooked to your desired tenderness and the sauce is well-mixed, remove the pan from heat and serve the vegetable stir-fry hot.
